title: Drop Watch Face
summary: Zen-style digital watch face with a gentle droplet animation for Android Wear.
description: A digital watch face with a battery percentage status and a gentle, minimallistic animation of a droplet smoothly dripping into the water. Second by second.Get relaxed with every glance while watching this nature-inspired daily companion. Feel the Zen.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
A digital watch face with a battery percentage status and a gentle, minimallistic animation of a droplet smoothly dripping into the water. Second by second.

Get relaxed with every glance while watching this nature-inspired daily companion. Feel the Zen.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: A pretty solid face Drop has beautiful, smooth animations and bright colors that I really appreciate.  I would like to be able to change the battery percentage to the date (and adding support for the Wear 2.0 complications API would be even better).  It would also be cool if you could make your own ripples on the face by tapping it.
Cool Maybe change the color option
